title: Zaheer Khan, Sagarika Ghatge in ‘happy space’; actor talks on her relationship | cricket | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Zaheer Khan, Sagarika Ghatge in ‘happy space’; actor talks on her relationship 
Zaheer Khan has been rumoured to date actor Sagarika Ghatge. The latter says the Indian cricket great come to watch her upcoming film cricket Updated: Feb 09, 2017 17:09 IST Hindustan Times Zaheer Khan has been rumoured to date Sagarika Ghatge (right).(Instagram) 
The rumour of Zaheer Khan dating Bollywood actress Sagarika Ghatge has been going on for quite some time now. However, the Chak De India girl finally gave a little insight about her relationship with the former India pacer. 
Sagarika Ghatge, who is busy promoting her upcoming film Irada, dropped a hint that Zaheer Khan is indeed special to her. “Before you ask, yes he (Zaheer) will watch my film (Irada) when it releases,” Sagarika Ghatge was quoted as saying by Mid-Day. 
The rumours of Zaheer Khan dating Sagarika Ghatge became stronger when the couple was seen together at Yuvraj Singh and Hazel Keech’s wedding bash where it is believed the two were inseparable. 
“Let’s just say I am in a very happy space right now. I have never spoken about my personal relationships. In fact, I have never spoken about anything to the press. Personal space is not for discussion,” she added. 
“I will remain just the way I am: low profile as ever. Why should I be any different just because I am linked to someone? I am not the kind who can put up a farce. I have no shame in admitting that I draw into my shell easily and come out only when I have to speak. I have big respect for Zaheer’s game,” she added. tags
